ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] getting started
ygData.msgSnippet: FINALLY someone Mentioned the shaman. =D I started playing EQ in January. I now have a level 40 Vah Shir shaman that rocks. I have damage over time spells that
ygData.messageBody:
FINALLY someone Mentioned the shaman. =D I started playing EQ in January. I now have a level 40 Vah Shir shaman that rocks. I have damage over time spells that can do around 2000 pts in damage in just under 2 minutes,  Plus a pet who can do the rest of the damage while the dot's are doing their work.  Like Orion said,  I have SOW, plus buffs that enhance all melee stats.  With the click of a button, I can give my whole group SOW with an attack bonus on it. I also have a spell that does the same with Strength.  I can increase your Agility, Dex, Stamina all by 30.  by the time I get to 60 I will have a spell that increases those stats by 120 AND your attack by 120.  I have buffs that increase your HP and AC although they are not as powerful as a clerics, combined with the stat buffs they more than make up.  I also have stat debuffing spells that can slow a mob,  decrease strength, and decrease their resists so that a wizard or any other spellcasting class can nuke the mob.  There are also a few nukes a shaman can get although not as powerful as a wizard.  We can also act as back up healers if the cleric is OOM or getting hit.  Overall,  I think that the shaman is one of the best balanced classes and a great class to start with.   Although the mid range armor (totemic) IS a might difficult to get =D  (finally just got my totemic BP)  I would suggest starting either a vah shir,  or barbarian as they can go more places without being killed everywhere they go.  As a vah shir,  I am KOS to very few places =D  Sorry about the soapbox,  but I love my Shaman.  I also forgot to add that at 25 (you're better off starting at 30) you get alchemy..  you can make potions that you can sell to other players like SOW, & invis vs undead which can be quite handy...  Oh,  Shamans also have the ability to gate.

Katashaka Naboombu                                                                                                                                                                      40 Shaman and future grandmaster alchemist                                                                                                                                       Vazaelle  Proud Member of Champions of War

 

  Orion <orionv@...> wrote:

I think everyone is forgetting a really great one. The Shaman....decent tanking skills,spells including SOW(at 9),heals,buffs,debuffs and later pets.
 
 


Princess.....  having had sufficent experience with frogs,  finally found a real prince
